Body: Possible Duplicate:  I've rooted my phone. Now what?  I'm considering rooting my Galaxy S2. But would just like to make 100% sure that the benefits that comes with rooting your device makes it worth while.Main reason for me looking up on this is that I'm sick of apps connecting to the net (apps like calculators etc, wtf) and using up the little data that I have. I've read that once you rooted your device there are a couple of apps that let you control which apps do and don't get internet access.... I like that, I'm the one that is supposed to have the say.So is it worth it?
Title: Benefits of Rooting Your Android Device?

history.Text: I'm considering rooting my Galaxy S2. But would just like to make 100% sure that the benefits that comes with rooting your device makes it worth while.Main reason for me looking up on this is that I'm sick of apps connecting to the net (apps like calculators etc, wtf) and using up the little data that I have. I've read that once you rooted your device there are a couple of apps that let you control which apps do and don't get internet access....
